WRITING.TEXT: https://www.twitch.tv/getcarriedgames

That's more of what I am looking for, like some kind of dev chart saying (Next beta update will be "specified date" and will have "new features and fixes", and then next phase of beta after that) this has nothing. Not one bit of documentation and this game was funded by us. All the people who kickstarted it, and we know nothing about when the next update is supposed to come out even though we are in beta and the game is very much unplayable for many people. It's very weird.
EDIT: I should point out that I really want this game to be good. Im not trying to shit on the developers but I am getting quite concerned with the updates and features. The game is so bland right now. Besides the base NPC interactions(which are bugged to hell, at best) there is nothing special to this game. No random interactions, no people partying and drinking at bars. I dont know, i feel like the game is so bland at the moment, I want it to be updated soon so they can start proving me wrong.

WRITING.TITLE: How are they distributing keys?
WRITING.TEXT:
I signed up on distribute() 10 mins after the online beta post was posted, so I was probably one of the first people to sign up. I have yet to receive my key and in getting slightly frustrated because a bunch of other people have theirs already.
I resigned up a couple more times recently and I still haven't got it
what in the fuck
"hey fuck off mate"

*"I love the world fidelity of the open world. the vegetation and geography is almost photo realistic and minimap is a nice design. But everything else sucks balls."*
This youtube comment kinda sum up how I am starting to feel about this game. I understand it's beta but so much is lacking from a game that has been under professional development for over 2 years. A beta is supposed to be a complete game with tons of bugs and optimizations left to fix. The combat is still very clunky(because its not been updated in 2 months), the dialogue and flow is very very poor, the game has 0 personality. There is nothing special about it at the moment besides that it is very pretty looking. Also before any of you shit on me for giving my opinion, know that I own this game and have put 14 frustrating hours into playing it. Although currently it is so bug riddled that I cannot stay in a game for longer than 15 minutes before my game crashes and corrupts my save. It is actually unplayable at this moment(for me at least). My main beef with this game right now is that it has not been updated since the beta was released and it desperately needs one to at least make it playable again.

WRITING.TEXT:
Barnetta's free kick from 25 yards out in the 90th minute Friday gave the Union a 2-1 MLS win over Orlando City before 15,011 at Talen Energy Stadium.
The shot hit inside the upper right cross bar and bounced in. The Union had set up their wall behind Orlando City's in an offside position, but then the players ran onside.
Orlando City keeper Joe Bendik, who made several big saves, barely moved on the shot.
"He was not comfortable, he couldn't see the ball and I was happy to take it and happy to score like this," said Barnetta
Read more at http://www.philly.com/philly/sports/20160409_Union_beat_Orlando_City__move_into_first.html#Yd6DKJOMQyltLzR3.99

http://www.philly.com/philly/sports/20160409_Union_beat_Orlando_City__move_into_first.html#Yd6DKJOMQyltLzR3.99
Barnetta's free kick from 25 yards out in the 90th minute Friday gave the Union a 2-1 MLS win over Orlando City before 15,011 at Talen Energy Stadium.
The shot hit inside the upper right cross bar and bounced in. The Union had set up their wall behind Orlando City's in an offside position, but then the players ran onside.
Orlando City keeper Joe Bendik, who made several big saves, barely moved on the shot.
"He was not comfortable, he couldn't see the ball and I was happy to take it and happy to score like this," said Barnetta

So basically what you're saying is that you want a solid and very much needed goalkeeper to risk getting seriously injured trying to reach a ball that he knows is unstoppable so he can look like he tried? He isn't dumb, he knows what he is doing. He isn't going to go for a ball that far out of reach, there is 0 need to do that.
Some of the bendik haters here are unpleasable. It's like they didn't see the other 90% of the game where he made 2 good saves.
What'd you want him to do? the ball was significantly out of reach. That was an insanely well placed strike, some of you guys need to get out of the habit of blaming goalkeepers for every goal.
